title: The Rebound
description: He was supposed to be my forever loveUntil he becomes my personal hell...Declan Beauchamp: he’s the super-hot, super-bad boy actor.I’m the new voice, who has an overnight break-out single.Together we are unbeatable.A match-made-in-tabloid heaven.Until he betrays me...I put him behind and move on.I even have a new boyfriend.Except my career is in freefall...Only consolation?Declan isn’t faring better either.With my future and his at stake.Declan comes up with a plan.One movie together,And a fake relationship to catapult our futures back on track.But when our chemistry detonates,I know I can’t survive this encounter.I tell him the deal is off,Except it’s too late...A standalone, enemies-to-lovers fake relationship billionaire romance about mistakes, heartache, and second chances.
author: L. Steele
